name: Gay World
description: 2 mini-games - in 1 You play as an officer of Gaypolice, who must arrest all straight people. And in 2 mode you play for straight, got to GAYLAG and you need to squats on the bottle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
